attributes.additional_details: After a successful London 2012 olympics and the success of our team GB, to celebrate the success as a country we should have a country parade of our great team GB. Our best Olympic medal haul for over a decade and they did us all proud. To value their dedication and hard work over the years has bought us great results from cycling, rowing, running, swimming to boxing. They all did us proud. To recognise their hard work we should have a parade of the whole country as we did for the Olympic torch.
